Class EmployeeDatabase

java.lang.Object
  EmployeeDatabase

public class EmployeeDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a database of the employees, their absences, and the reasons for their absences.

Author:
Divya

editEmployees

public void editEmployees(java.lang.String searchName,
                          Person edited)
Changes the person given in the database

Parameters:
searchName - The name of the person to be edited
edited - The person to be put in place of the old name. If the person is the same, but information as been changed, a new person with the changed information will be put in.
